How to Play:

Game of Fifteen is a classic combination puzzle. Originally called Gem Puzzle, it was a wooden box with 15 numbered tiles. The goal of Fifteen Puzzle is to arrange the tiles from 1 to 15 by sliding them one by one into the empty space on the board. The puzzle is considered solved when tile 1 is in the top left corner, tile 2 is to the right of it, and so on, with the empty space on the bottom right. To move a tile into the empty space, you can click or touch on it, or tap to the playing area. Tiles can only move vertically or horizontally.
